selected_skills.name: determine_angle_in_circle
selected_skills.purpose: To calculate the unknown angle ∠CAB using properties of circles and inscribed angles.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the given angle ∠ADC and the diagram to determine ∠CAB.

selected_skills.name: map_angle_to_option
selected_skills.purpose: To map the calculated angle to one of the provided multiple-choice options.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the calculated angle ∠CAB and the provided options to select the correct answer.
